translations: n.服从，遵守；屈从，迁就；可塑性，柔量

phrs.translation: 合规性审计；符合规章审计；法规符合审计
病人的依从性；病人的配合度
符合证明；一致的证明；合约完成证明书

sentences.sentence: Inspectors were sent to visit nuclear sites and verify compliance with the treaty.
sentences.translation: 监察员被派去参观核址并核实条约的遵守情况。

sentences.sentence: The U.N. Security Council has linked any lifting of sanctions to compliance with the ceasefire terms.
sentences.translation: 联合国安全理事会将任何制裁的解除与遵守停火条款联系起来。

sentences.sentence: New regulations have imposed extensive compliance costs on companies still using older industrial coal-fired burners.
sentences.translation: 新规定给仍在使用老式工业燃煤燃烧器的公司带来了巨大的合规成本。
